activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: Wear a hairnet to cover your 'ear's properly.
Keep the kitchen cl'ear' of dirt.
Don’t keep frozen meats n'ear' other food in the freezer.
The food engin'eer' inspected the freezer.

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_a: Can you use a commercial potato peeler?
example_dialogues.text_b: No, I can’t. But I can use a commercial dishwasher.

example_dialogues.text_a: Can you sew a saree blouse?
example_dialogues.text_b: No, I can’t. But I can sew a pillow case.

example_dialogues.text_a: Can you repair a horse carriage?
example_dialogues.text_b: No, I can’t. But I can repair a bullock cart.

keywords.word: wheat flour string hoppers / red rice kiribath
an electric truck / an electric three-wheeler
a wall-mounted fan / a built-in dishwasher

dialogues.text_a: Can you cook wheat flour string hoppers?
dialogues.text_b: No, I can’t. But I can cook red rice kiribath.

dialogues.text_a: Can you drive an electric truck?
dialogues.text_b: No, I can’t. But I can drive an electric three-wheeler.

dialogues.text_a: Can you fix a wall-mounted fan?
dialogues.text_b: No, I can’t. But I can fix a built-in dishwasher.
No, I can’t. But I can bake French baguettes.
No, I can’t. But I can play the rabana.
No, I can’t. But I can speak Japanese.

activity_a.text:
Read the questions and choose an answer according to your level of skill. 
ප්‍රශ්න කියවන්න සහ ඔබේ කුසලතා මට්ටමට අනුව පිළිතුරක් තෝරන්න.
கேள்விகளைப் படியுங்கள் மற்றும் உங்கள் திறன் நிலைக்கு ஏற்ப பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுங்கள்.

content.sentence: Can you make short eats like fish buns, patties and samosas?
options: Yes, I can. Actually I can do it very well.
Yes, I can. Not very well, but I am willing to learn.
No, I can’t. But I am sure I can learn quickly.
No, I can’t. No, not at all, but I am sure I can learn in no time.

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

Listen.
கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

Questions.question: Can you handle complex laboratory testing or large-scale quality control systems?
Questions.answer: No, I can’t. No, not at all, but I am sure I can learn in no time under good guidance.
options: No, I can’t. No, not at all, but I am sure I can learn in no time under good guidance.
Yes, I can. Actually, I can do it quite well.
No, I can’t. But I am sure I can learn quickly.

Questions.question: Can you operate food processing and packaging machines in the factory?
Questions.answer: Yes, I can. Actually, I can do it quite well.
options: Yes, I can. Actually, I can do it quite well.
No, I can’t. But I am sure I can learn quickly.
I can do it, but not very well. But I am willing to learn.

Questions.question: Can you work in hot or cold areas in the production line?
Questions.answer: Yes, I am. Actually, I am very good at it.
options: Yes, I am. Actually, I am very good at it.
No, I can’t. But I am sure I can learn quickly.
I can do it, but not very well. But I am willing to learn.

Questions.answer: No, I can’t. But I am sure I can learn quickly.
options: No, I can’t. But I am sure I can learn quickly.

Yes, I can. Actually, I can do it quite well.

Questions.question: Can you help prepare a high volume of dishes for wedding parties?
Questions.answer: I can do it, but not very well. But I am willing to learn.
options: I can do it, but not very well. But I am willing to learn.
No, I can’t. Not at all, but I am sure I can learn in no time under good guidance.
Yes, I can. Actually, I can do it quite well.

instrction_a.text:
Watch this video to help you better understand today’s lesson.
අද පාඩම හොඳින් අවබෝධ කර ගැනීමට මෙම වීඩියෝව බලන්න.
இன்றைய பாடத்தை நன்றாக புரிந்துகொள்ள இந்த வீடியோவைப் பாருங்கள்.

instruction_b.text:
These steps will help you to learn English from this video.
මෙම පියවරන් ඔබට මෙම වීඩියෝවෙන් ඉංග්‍රීසි ඉගෙන ගැනීමට උදව් කරනු ඇත.
இந்த வீடியோவிலிருந்து ஆங்கிலம் கற்க இந்த படிகள் உங்களுக்கு உதவும்.
steps:
Watch the video 2 times.
වීඩියෝව වර දෙකක් බලන්න.
வீடியோவை இரண்டு முறைப் பாருங்கள்.

Explain any new words using Google Translator.
Google පරිවර්තකය භාවිතයෙන් නව වචන කිහිපයක් විස්තර කරන්න.
Google மொழிபெயர்ப்பாளரைப் பயன்படுத்தி சில புதிய வார்த்தைகளை விளக்குங்கள்.

Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.
